original:
A portfolio career consists of a variety of roles rather than a single job within one organization. This career path can include a combination of paid and voluntary positions. The concept of a portfolio career was popularized by philosopher and organizational behaviorist Charles Handy in his 1994 book, 
In 2006, journalist Penelope Trunk noted on her blog that the rise of portfolio careers coincided with the entry of Generation X into t
